title: Technical Program Manager, Camera Components
summary: At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish!...
description: Manage a team of Process, Test, Automation and Quality Engineers in the development of critical modules, sub-assemblies, and components that enable amazing new features for Apple products...
preferred_qualifications:
Proven record of leading a multi-functional team in order to achieve new product objectives inclusive of quality, yield, and cost
Dedicated in working with international OEM partners with great passion
Experienced in design for manufacturability, FMEA, tolerance...
